recipesJson.name: Pumpkindoodle Cookie
recipesJson.author: ID10-T
recipesJson.description: A pumpkin-infused soft and chewy snickerdoodle cookie perfect for fall.

reviews.text: Fantastic.  Great cookie note, and tastes a bit like actual pumpkin. The spice mix is used judiciously and accentuates the pumpkin well.  Sweet, fluffy, and interesting.
